title: SRU Squirrel-thingies
body:
What are these? Where did they come from? Where can I buy one? And, most importantly, WHY AREN'T THEY RECIEVING THE LOVE THAT POROS ARE GETTING?
Rito plz respond.
P.S. How would they react to poros?
P.P.S. Can we make them interacteable like the poros?
THX!
Edit: Guys help get Rito on here, we need to raise awareness during Kawaii-Squirrel month!

replies.body:
http://www.nabyn.com/_p/2012/2/11/SkepticArcher-32686-43021.jpg
Look over there! That's a Rift Jackalope! They weigh several pounds and bolt the moment they're approached. I'm going to pick it up.
http://www.marceyrader.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/squirrel.jpg
Why, they're Antlermice of course!  They're indigenous to Valoran.  They're pretty shy though, which is probably why noone's seen them till recently.  ;)
Antlermice should be the summer version of poros
if they're Antlermice, can we have something special for these cut little creatures, like maybe a summoner icon or even better, and ANTLERMICE WARD?

YES WE NEED THIS

FILL THE RIFT WITH ANTLERMICE

Rito plz 
Also, all the sudden new comments were quite a surprise. I made this post a couple of months ago with not much response. Bring it back!!! Antlermice MUST be the DR mascot :D
eevee is trying to meet up with pikachu
Dammit, I was gonna make that joke.

THESE CREATURES ARE ADORABLE!
How did I miss them before!?
They fade into the background! This is a horrible atrocity to the furry creatures, which is why they MUST be made interactable! Say no to neglected antlermice! Say yes to interactable critters!

WHAT ARE THEY CALLED I MUST KNOW

SQUEROS?
what about the Lizards, Frogs, Birds, and that one Snail? just cuz you don't think they're "cute" they shouldn't get the same amount of love? >:L
Only Fred (the frog on the red side who kills himself) also gets my love! Other rift critters only get affection :D
We need more squirrel awareness
It's an eevee. Sure im not the first ;p

YES PLEASE 
Also in the stairs to bot lane in the top-right side of the map just under inhibiter tower, just outside the map you can see a frog jump off a cliff about 1 minute in.
I named him Fred ^.^

We have a free slot for an Antlemouse-snax, please make Pantheon bake some for those little cutties so that they wont be so shy of us.

Also Baker Pantheon skin pls, with Antlemouses eagerly awaiting his baked goods in the background of his splahs art.
bump!
Bumperinoing the bumperino

YES MAKE THESE BE AS FAMOUS AS POROS! 
GOOOO SQUIRRELS!
MY LEAGUE FRIENDS AND BOYFRIEND WOULD LOVE THESE LITTLE DUDES
IDK WHY IM YELLING XD
do I need to click the link button?

Those look like the fox-squirrels from Naussica http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/characters/4/15071.jpg

I really need to figure out how to add an image to a post without uploading an image.

Just copy and paste the url to the picture

if its too long, than use url shortener

this must become a thing now

it is our job to make that happen

now go my children, to the corners of the boards, and spread this newfound knowledge with all!

HAHA! NOBODY MADE THIS JOKE YET: THEY'RE OBVIOUSLY GNAR'S KIND AFTER EVOLVING OVER SUCH A LONG TIME. {{champion:150}} RITO CAN'T EVEN DENY THIS THEORY. LOOK AT THEM EARS. THE PROOF IS IN THE (YORDLE) PUDDING.

Sejuani used to have these as pets till a giant Poro ate them.. Poro's eat these as snacks and one Poro ate all of Sejuani's squirrel things so Sejauni went out to find that Poro and decided to ride that instead of Boar as punishment. The more you know.
lel
I have a theory that they're related to Gnar, which means they're far off genetic cousins of Yordles.
also, they are on blue said mainly, while red side has frogs
KAWAII SQUIRREL

they're called critters. 

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/08/826-pbe-azir.html
They are called Antler-Mice if I'm not mistaken. I like them alot more than poros lol.

there's a dear
and a lizard on top red/blue side.
dear is near top side blue buff.. lizard is near top side tri bush ;]

.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2FYt1Ez67a0#t=27
